item.title: April Maptime...No Foolin'
item.description: This past Wednesday's Maptime was a hit with 16 geo folk from print cartography to web dev. Presos on CamliStore, Python and Geodata BFFs, and SpatialDev Project Management Tools. We're meeting up again this Friday, April 4 for morning coffee and brekkie so bring your projects, ideas, and appetite to Glyph Cafe and Art Space.

item.title: February Maptime!
item.description:
What: February Maptime: Demos and Hacking

Where: Esri R&D Center

When: Wednesday, February 5, 2014 from 6â€“8:30pm

January's meetup was good chance to get our bearing for the year and get a sense of what we're all getting into. This month, we've got a little more structure and we will be starting the meetup with three presentations - an intro D3, TileMill 1 & 2, and the guts of the MaptimePDX site. Presos are around 10 minutes but there's time for Q&A and hands on around the topics. But by all means, bring your own ideas and projects! And as always, beginners welcome so bring your laptops.

This will be the last meetup at the Esri R&D Center (aka Geoloqi HQ) as they are moving to new digs. Next month is up for grabs so if you know of a good location, tweet us @maptimepdx with your idea.
